Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Jinham ne apane kura'ana nu tukare-tukare kara dita
Isa la'i tere raba di sahu asim unham sari'am nu zarura puchange
Isa la'i jisa ziza da tuhanu hukama mili'a hai, usa nu sapasata suna devo ate musarakam (saca'i vica milavata karana vale) nu muha na la'o
Asim tuhade valom, unham mazaka karana vali'am la'i kafi ham
Jihare alaha de baî€¼rabaî€¼ra duji'am nu sarika bana'unde tam jaladi hi uha jana lainage
Ate asim janade ham ki jihara kujha uha kahide hana, usa nala tuhada dila taga huda hai
Isa la'i tusim apane raba da khusi nala gunagana karo ate sijada karana vali'am vicom bano
Ate apane raba di badagi karom. Ithom' taka ki tuhade kola va'ada kiti ho'i yakini gala a jave
A gi'a alaha da phaisala, tam usa la'i kahali na karo. Uha pavitara ate ucatama hai, usa nalom, jisa nu uha alaha de barabara sarika manade hana

Uha farisati'am nu apane hukama (vahi) de nala bhejada hai. Apane badi'am vicom' jisa nu uha cahuda hai ki uha lokam nu savadhana karana ki mere tom bina ko'i hora puje jana de kabila nahim' tam tusim mere tom daro
Usane akasam ate dharati nu haka ate makasada nala paida kita hai. Uha ucatama hai, usa siraka (alaha de barabara sarika) nalom jihara uha kara rahe hana
Usa ne manukha nu ika buda (viraja) tom bana'i'a. Phira uha acanaka khul'hama khula jhagarana lagi'a
Ate usa ne janavaram nu bana'i'a, unham vica tuhade la'i basatara, bhojana samagari ate duje labha vi hana. Inham vicom tusim khande vi ho
Ate unham vica tuhade la'i sasarika raunaka hai, jadom sama ve same tusim unham nu li'a'unde ho, ate jadom savera vele unham nu chadana jande ho
